pydatafaker.business.create_employee_table¶

pydatafaker.business.create_employee_table(vendor_id, n=100)[source]¶

Create a table of fake employees.

Parameters

  • vendor_id (list) – A list of vendor ids to randomly assign to employees.

  • n (int, optional) – The number of employees to create, by default 100.

Returns

A dataframe containing: employee_id, employee_name, and vendor_id.

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

pydatafaker.business.create_vendor_table pydatafaker.business.create_po_table
